args.goal: Move the orange bottle to the blue plate

tasks.check_point: Move to the initial position above the bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is positioned above the orange bottle.

tasks.check_point: Lower the arm to grasp the bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is lowered to the level of the orange bottle.

tasks.check_point: Close the gripper to hold the bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm's gripper is closed, holding the orange bottle.
The robotic arm is lifted, holding the orange bottle.

tasks.check_point: Move to the position above the blue plate
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is positioned above the blue plate, holding the orange bottle.

tasks.check_point: Lower the arm to place the bottle on the plate
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is lowered to the level of the blue plate, holding the orange bottle.

tasks.check_point: Open the gripper to release the bottle
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm's gripper is open, releasing the orange bottle on the blue plate.

tasks.check_point: Lift the arm back to the initial position
tasks.expected_image_description: The robotic arm is lifted back to the initial position.
